assessment.description: No Go native fuzz tests (func FuzzXxx) found in the codebase.

recommended_fuzz_targets.rationale: JCS is the canonical serialization; malformed input could bypass hash consistency
Policy enforcement boundary — malformed inputs could bypass allowlist
Perimeter enforcement — regex/pattern matching on untrusted input
CEL expression evaluation with untrusted context

rationale: Fuzz testing is a 2026 SOTA requirement for security-critical parsers (JCS, JWT, JSON Schema). Missing fuzzing is a notable gap.
